column3: “Wow what a wonderful strain! Took away my anxiety and was able to stay focused and On task while doing computer work but all my aches and pains disappeared. I was gifted seeds of this strain while visiting Alaska by a guy named Jeff ,I only wish I knew where to get more of these great genetics! I've been growing Cannabis for 11 years and have never found any autoflower seeds or strains I liked up until now! Jeff said...”
“Nicely balanced hybrid. Gives a good indica body high while maintaining a sativa focus and visuals.”
